name: FLEURS (19-lang avg)
description: Multilingual speech recognition benchmark averaging the 19-language subset of the Google FLEURS corpus.

metrics.name: wer
metrics.definition: Average Word Error Rate across the selected language evaluation sets

test_method: Evaluate each language independently following the official scripts, then average macro-wise over the chosen 19 languages.
notes: Clearly state language list, normalization rules, and whether punctuation is removed prior to scoring.
